notes.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
notes.p: Conceived and designed the experiments: EL, CHK, YJL, HBK, BSK, HYK, YSK, SYK, CRP, JHS, ISS, MSS, MSS, DJS, YMA, HLO, JHY, SSJ, KSL, JSL, GCJ, YYJ, EHC, HLC, SMC, YJC, MYH, JYS, JTK, CKK, and HJY. Performed the experiments: EL, CHK, YJL, HBK, BSK, HYK, YSK, SYK, CRP, JHS, ISS, MSS, MSS, DJS, YMA, HLO, JHY, SSJ, KSL, JSL, GCJ, YYJ, EHC, HLC, SMC, YJC, MYH, JYS, JTK, CKK, and HJY. Contributed reagents/materials/analysis tools: YSK, SYK, and CRP. Contributed to the writing of the manuscript: EL, CHK, CRP and HJY. All authors contributed to manuscript revisions. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
